MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L6 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Ottley Street.  In order to complete repairs and remove generators our engineers on site need to isolate the power from 2:30pm today and we expect the power to be restored by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:50pm on 2nd February 2021.
